name: A Favor
description:
A Favor This game is a  2017 Unreal Engine 4 Summer Jam submission.

A short game about a small and strange village, in which you find yourself helping a man to organize a pool party during a rainy day.

The game was made from scratch in Unreal Engine 4 during the game jam. We'll update the game and add more features, characters, and more bizarre tasks!
